source.1e366d2a:
df = pd.read_csv('../input/baggerscsv/larger_dataframe.csv').rename(columns = {'file_name': 'date'}, inplace = False)
df_small=pd.read_csv('../input/baggerscsv/larger_dataframe_small.csv').rename(columns = {'file_name': 'date'}, inplace = False)
data=pd.read_csv('../input/baggerscsv/simple_dataframe.csv').rename(columns = {'file_name': 'date'}, inplace = False)
data_small=pd.read_csv('../input/baggerscsv/simple_dataframe_small.csv').rename(columns = {'file_name': 'date'}, inplace = False)

data.date = pd.to_datetime(data.date, unit='s', origin='unix')
data_small.date = pd.to_datetime(data_small.date, unit='s', origin='unix')
df.date = pd.to_datetime(df.date, unit='s', origin='unix')
df_small.date = pd.to_datetime(df_small.date, unit='s', origin='unix')
source.9c5fe4bb:
print(len(data))
print(len(data_small))
print(len(data.merge(data_small, how='inner')))
print(len(data.merge(data_small, how='outer')))
